title: A dual-signal optical sensing platform of CDs–MnO2 NS composites for facile detection of ascorbic acid based on a combination of Tyndall effect scattering and fluorescence
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17491-17497
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02340D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
ShuJing Zhou, Jing Wan, Jianmei Zou, Yulan Zhang, Huijun He, Wei Li, Jiale Hu, Jinfang Nie, Yali Yuan, Yun Zhang
A Tyndall effect scattering and fluorescence dual-signal optical sensing platform based on CDs–MnO2 NS composites was successfully constructed for the detection of ascorbic acid.
